DOC.brief_summary: Vitamins modulate homocysteine affect TNF-alpha , vascular endothelial growth factor , theoretically enhance anti-inflammatory version NOS thus hopefully increase efficacy reduce chance toxicity adalimumab determine blood test EKGs .
DOC.brief_title: Addition Modulators Homocysteine Adalimumab Therapy Treatment Moderate Severe Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study design evaluate whether addition oral vitamin B12 , vitamin B6 , folic acid use adalimumab psoriasis lead improvement patient 's psoriasis quality life .
